alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 2:08PM PDT until April 12 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MONDAY TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches. Ridgelines and higher peaks could see a foot or more of new snow. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 8 AM Monday to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
